title: Studio Portal — Restore multi-section navigation and admin areas

requirements.summary: Re-add working top-level routes/pages for Photos, Videos, Events, and previously existing related sections; expose navigation links while keeping /admin Orders working.
acceptanceCriteria: App routing includes dedicated routes (not placeholders) for Photos, Videos, and Events pages in addition to existing Home and Admin routes.
Navigating to the restored routes renders non-empty pages (not blank files) and does not redirect to Home due to notFound routing.
Header navigation provides visible links (or a menu) to reach the restored sections (Photos/Videos/Events at minimum) without needing to type URLs.
Orders admin section remains accessible at /admin and continues to function as-is.

file_operations.description: Register TanStack Router routes for restored public sections: /photos, /videos, /events (minimum), and wire existing related pages that previously existed (e.g., /favorites, /portfolio, /business-info, /special-moments, /media-groups and any detail routes that already have page files) so they render real pages and are not caught by the notFound redirect.

Update header navigation to include visible links (or a compact menu) for Photos, Videos, and Events (minimum) and keep Home and Admin links. Ensure the /admin link remains present and unchanged in behavior.

Implement a non-empty Photos landing page with section title, brief description, and primary actions (e.g., browse albums, view favorites) and wire in a reusable viewer component to avoid blank content.
Implement a non-empty Videos landing page with section title, brief description, and primary actions (e.g., browse, filter) so it is a real page and not an empty placeholder.
Implement a non-empty Events landing page with section title, brief description, and primary actions (e.g., view event list, open event details) so it is a real page and not an empty placeholder.
Implement a non-empty Favorites page to restore the previously existing related section, including basic list scaffolding and clear empty-state messaging.
Implement a non-empty Portfolio page to restore the previously existing related section, including basic layout scaffolding and sample tiles/sections (static or client-side placeholder data).
Implement a non-empty Business Info page to restore the previously existing related section, including basic contact/about scaffolding and clear labels.
Implement a non-empty Special Moments page to restore the previously existing related section, including a basic gallery/list scaffold and empty states.
Implement a non-empty Special Moment detail page scaffold (title, metadata area, actions, and content region) to support navigation to an individual moment.
Implement a non-empty Media Group page scaffold (group title, description, and list/gallery region) to restore the previously existing related section.
Implement a non-empty Event Detail page scaffold (title, date/time display area, access/visibility messaging, and media sections) to ensure event deep-links render content.
Implement a non-empty Event page scaffold (overview, calls to action) if it previously existed separately from Events/Detail pages; ensure it renders meaningful content.
Implement a non-empty Photo Detail page scaffold to support navigation from Photos lists into an individual photo view.

requirements.summary: Restore user-facing content and UI structure for Photos/Videos/Events and related sections; update Home to reflect the multi-section experience with English-only labels.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page is updated so it is not exclusively an “Order Management System” marketing page; it includes entry points to the restored sections (Photos/Videos/Events at minimum).
Each restored section page includes basic layout scaffolding (title, description, primary actions) and does not show empty/blank content.
All user-facing text introduced/updated by this change is in English.

file_operations.description: Revise Home content away from an order-only marketing page: add entry cards/CTAs to Photos, Videos, and Events (minimum) and optionally highlight related restored sections. Ensure all displayed text is in English.
Update footer branding/copy so it matches the Studio Portal multi-section experience (not only orders). Ensure text is in English.

Implement a basic, non-empty Photos viewer component used by Photos/Favorites/Special Moments pages: grid layout, selection handling, and an empty state. Where media previews are shown, plan for use of the blob-storage ExternalBlob direct URL when available. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Implement photo action controls UI (e.g., favorite/like toggle, share/copy link, download button scaffold) to restore prior interactivity and ensure pages are not empty.

Add frontend utilities for media handling that align with blob-storage: creating ExternalBlob instances from File/bytes, reading direct URLs for preview/streaming, and optional upload progress wiring helpers. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Restore admin panel navigation and additional admin sections beyond Orders with functional, non-empty UIs while keeping existing admin access checks.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin page no longer renders only OrdersSection; it provides a way to access additional admin sections (tabs/side navigation/accordion is acceptable).

Each admin section that is currently an empty placeholder renders functional UI (not empty files), at least for listing existing entities and providing create/update/delete or upload flows where applicable.
Admin access checks remain in place; non-admin users still see the admin access helper flow.

file_operations.description: Keep existing authentication/admin gating logic intact, but add an admin navigation UI (tabs/side-nav) to switch between Orders and restored admin sections. Ensure OrdersSection remains available and working as-is within /admin.

Implement a functional Photo upload/management UI: list existing items (client-side state or query integration placeholder without runtime crashes), add/upload flow with file picker, preview, and basic edit/delete interactions. Use blob-storage ExternalBlob for preview/direct URL and upload progress wiring where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Implement a functional Video upload/management UI: list, add/upload, and delete/update scaffolding with non-empty content. Use blob-storage ExternalBlob direct URL approach for previews/links and upload progress where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Implement a functional Event management UI: list events, create/edit form scaffolding (title/date/visibility), and delete action (client-side state or safe integration placeholder) so the section is not empty.

Implement a functional Special Moments admin UI: list items, create/edit form scaffolding, and delete action. Where moments include media, structure the UI to display media via blob-storage direct URL when available. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Implement a functional Shortlists admin UI scaffold: list entries, view details, and basic management actions so the section is not empty.
Implement a functional Visitors admin UI scaffold: display visitor list/statistics layout with filters/date ranges (UI-only if necessary) and non-empty states.

Implement a functional Footer editing UI scaffold: editable fields (e.g., copyright text, links), preview area, and save/reset actions (client-side state or safe integration placeholder) so the section is not empty.
Implement a functional User statistics admin UI scaffold: summary cards and list/table layout with non-empty states.
